title: Unban Old Account

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner data for AdoIf HitIer in Oceania. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body: It has been 3 Years since i was banned, in that time i have reformed and am now a very clam and helpful team player.  I am writing this to ask if i can have my account back that was banned.  I understand the premise of which i was banned but being that i was banned a long time ago and have shown that i am able to perform at a more helpful and less toxic level I think this is enough to show that i have reformed and hope that i may get my account back.  This account has never received a ban which i am rather proud of due to my prior actions,  I believe i have reformed and hope that i may have my account return to me.  The summoner name of my other account was "AdoIf HitIer" (two capital i's instead of l's).  Please respond{{champion:64}} {{summoner:36}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: You would need to submit a ticket, forums won't get you anywhere.
